reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater nice-looking, soft, and comfortable, with great quality and perfect for winter wear. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's true to size. The fit receives mixed reviews, with several customers finding it runs big, while opinions on flatteringness are divided.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to wear And Warm!!!
items.body: Warm!!! And Simple design…. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Recieved this chunky sweatet a few day ago and let me tell you, I love it. Soft, warm and so comfortable. I'm 5"8 and the sweater is a size L. I'm usually L in sweaters because I like them a bit baggy. I will be wearing this sweater tucked in like my picture so it fits just righ. But if I was going to be wearing it out not tucked in I would definitely size down to a M. Even with me being 5"8 because sweater is long enough. I'm so happy that the arm length fits me long past my wrist, it's hard to find sweaters that are long enough at the arms because i have long arms. I love the chuncky arms. The quality of the sweater is great. I will definitely be getting other colors in this sweater. Read more
items.author: sandy kugler

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, so so fit
items.body: Thick quality, and warm. The fit is okay but I don’t love it. I feel like it’s very baggy on top and in the arms but a little too cropped. The color is exactly as it looks in the pictures, washes well! Read more
items.author: Christine Penway

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's really soft and comfy!
items.body: I like the design, the color is the same I ordered and I love it, I ordered M size and it's not long, you can see it in my pictures, It's big (that's the idea anyways), but if you know how to style this sweater you can go out this season and look great! ;) or you can wear it at home and relax. Just one thing, the sweater sheds some lint so I recommend to wearing it with jeans. Read more
items.author: Daniela Contreras

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Frumpy on Me
items.body: Oversize sweaters are fine for skinny girls, but I just look frumpy. I normally wear L or XL so I ordered both. Even considering the oversize style, the large was too big. I looked like Dopey in the XL. I ordered the M and looked frumpy. It's soft and pretty, just not right for me. Read more
items.author: Jeanne Maher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will be pleases
items.body: Love this not too heavy already gettin compliments!!! Read more
items.author: Linda Vincent

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars TERRIBLE
items.body: Honestly over priced for it not to even be cute. Too big and it was a medium. NOT WORTH UR MONEY Read more
items.author: Marlo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t hesitate
items.body: This has become one of my favorite easy wear sweaters. It is incredibly soft and so comfortable. Will most likely order another in a different color, however the army green is lovely! Read more
items.author: LTew

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, Khaki, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Rust Red, Grey, Dark Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
